        Creates a new instance of XMLProducer. With a minified XML configured.

      • XmlProducer

        public XmlProducer​(java.io.OutputStreamWriter osw,
                   boolean minified)
        Creates a new instance of XMLProducer.
        Parameters:
        osw - the underlying output stream to be written
        minified - when false produces a human readable XML, other wise outputs a clean strait line

      • XmlProducer

        public XmlProducer​(java.io.OutputStreamWriter osw,
                   boolean minified,
                   boolean encodingWrite)
        Creates a new instance of XMLProducer.
        Parameters:
        osw - the underlying output stream to be written
        minified - when false produces a human readable XML, other wise outputs a clean strait line
        encodingWrite - set to write encoding on print metadata
